body: A solar generator consists of a fairly small converter attached to a set of huge reflective panels. It produces full yield while receiving direct sunlight. Its yield halves during overcast conditions. At night or when densely overcast, its yield drops to 0. A solar generator runs silently. A solar generator cannot be forced to exceed its yield.
name: Solar Generator
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifacts/Power Generators/Solar Generator
